  • Constructor Details

    • SingleTMonteCarloSimulation

      public SingleTMonteCarloSimulation​(double T, int temperatureIndex, int totalNumOfTemperatures, Lattice lattice, int numOfObservables, long maxSweeps, long seed, org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister rnd, boolean continueFromSave, OutputWriter out, boolean checkpoint, int maxIter, double alpha, BufferedWriter outProblematicConfigs, double spinSize, double tol, double J_ex)
      Constructs a new single-temperature Monte Carlo simulation
      Parameters:
      T - temperature
      temperatureIndex - index of this simulation within a MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      totalNumOfTemperatures - total number of simulated temperatures within the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      lattice - the Lattice object to be simulated
      numOfObservables - total number of observables to be measured and saved
      maxSweeps - total number of MC sweeps to perform
      seed - random number generator seed
      rnd - random number generator object
      continueFromSave - whether to continue the simulation from a saved checkpoint if exists
      out - writer object used to output the results
      checkpoint - whether to periodically create a checkpoint from which the simulation can be restarted
      maxIter - Maximum iterations for iterative solvers
      alpha - Relaxation parameter for iterative solver
      outProblematicConfigs - Writer to output configurations that were not successfully solved self-consistently by any of the available methods
      spinSize - the typical magnetic moment of the spins
      tol - tolerance for convergence of the self-consistent calculation
      J_ex - exchange interaction parameter
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if one of the tables in given lattice (intTable, nnArray, exchangeIntTable, momentTable or energyTable) are null

      Parameters:

    • getNumOfTimesMethodWasUsed

      public int getNumOfTimesMethodWasUsed​(int methodIndex)
      Gets the number of time a given method was successfully used to solve the self-consistent calcualtion
      Parameters:
      methodIndex - index of the method to check
      Returns:
      the total number of times the given method was successfully used. can be -1 in case previous data is missing due to starting an old simulation from checkpoint from before this data was collected.

    • metropolisStep

      public static deltaEnergyAndLattice metropolisStep​(Lattice lattice, double T, org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister rnd, int maxIter, double alpha, double tol) throws ConvergenceException
      Performs a Monte Carlo metropolis step
      Parameters:
      lattice - spin lattice
      T - Temperature
      rnd - random number generator
      Returns:
      object that holds the energy difference due to the MC step, the new lattice object after the step and the method that was used to solve the self-consistent calculation during the step. the returned Lattice will be null if the change is rejected, in which case the simulation should return to the Lattice state that was saved before the call to this method.
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException - when the self-consistent calculation does not converge with any of the available methods

    • printProblematicConfig

      public static void printProblematicConfig​(Lattice lattice, int flippedSpin, BufferedWriter out)
      Print out a problematic configuration (one that was not solved self-consistently by any of the available methods) using the given writer. This method is synchronized on the given out since all parallel simulation use the same writer. This method should not be called very often anyway, if it is being called often there are probably other issues the need to be fixed besides possible concurrency related inefficiencies
      Parameters:
      lattice - the lattice from before the spin flip
      flippedSpin - the spin that was flipped which caused the configuration to become 'problematic'
      out - the output writer that will be used to write this configuration

    • monteCarloSweep

      Performs a Monte Carlo sweep (N MC steps with N being the total number of spins)

    • checkEquilibration

      public static boolean checkEquilibration​(ArrayList<org.apache.commons.collections4.queue.CircularFifoQueue<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Double,​Double>>> arr)
      Checks whether the given array of averages and standard errors of different observables each agree within error bars
      Parameters:
      arr - Array of bin measurement averages and standard errors of different observables
      Returns:
      whether the bin averages of each observable all agree (have overlapping error ranges)

    • checkEquilibration

      public static boolean checkEquilibration​(org.apache.commons.collections4.queue.CircularFifoQueue<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Double,​Double>> binsOfObservable)
      Checks whether the given queue of a single observable's averages and standard deviations agree within error bars
      Parameters:
      binsOfObservable - queue of the last x (usually 3) bin averages and standard errors
      Returns:
      whether all bins agree (have overlapping error ranges)

    • runParameters

      public String runParameters​(String version, double[] T, String extraMessage, long mutualSeed, String tempScheduleFileName, boolean parallelTemperingOff)
      Generates a string with all of the parameters and their values used in this run
      Parameters:
      version - software version
      T - temperature array for the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      extraMessage - an extra text message to append to the list of parameters
      mutualSeed - the seed used by the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      tempScheduleFileName - name of the temperature schedule file used to set the temperatures in the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      parallelTemperingOff - whether to turn off parallel tempering (never swap temperatures)
      Returns:
      a string containing all info about the parameters used in this run

    • printRunParameters

      public void printRunParameters​(String version, double[] T, String extraMessage, long mutualSeed, String tempScheduleFileName, boolean parallelTemperingOff) throws IOException

      T - temperature array for the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation

      mutualSeed - the seed used by the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      tempScheduleFileName - name of the temperature schedule file used to set the temperatures in the containing MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
      parallelTemperingOff - whether to turn off parallel tempering (never swap temperatures)
      Throws:
